title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Mathematics Project-Based Learning through Educational Technology Research Trends Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics concepts and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain key components of mixed research methods (qualitative/quantitative data collection and analysis) in educational technology.
When designing math projects, learners can apply online learning tools and ICT strategies to improve learning outcomes by 20% or more.
Learners can design and implement smartphone-based project assessments for large learner groups in corporate settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
